description: Demolition of existing single storey ground floor rear extension with new single storey ground floor rear extension and external alterations to front elevation: new bike store, replacement of tiles to front porch, new front gate, alterations to front wall, reinstate cast iron fascia over porch, new rooflight to front roof slope.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Full details, with samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work on the site is commenced.  The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.\n\nREASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:16711680},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Full details, with photo samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before the relevant work on site&nbsp; commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span><br><br><span style="font-size: 14px;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></span><br></p>
